name: api_transport-octopush_get_collection
description: Retrieves the collection of TransportOctopush resources.

properties[].description: Allows you to reduce the response to contain only the properties you need. If your desired property is nested, you can address it using nested arrays. Example: properties[]={propertyName}&properties[]={anotherPropertyName}&properties[{nestedPropertyParent}][]={nestedProperty}

$block: The TransportOctopush resource is a collection of transports that carry dispatched alerts to the external Octopush service.

$ul: **createdAt**: When the resource instance was created. This date-time is in the UTC timezone.
**dataSegmentCode**: User-provided string on which to segment and filter data. Max 50 characters.
**id**: The unique identifier of the resource instance.
**octopushApiKey**: The API key for the Octopush service. Stored in encrypted format.
**octopushFrom**: The sender value for the Octopush service.
**octopushType**: The SMS type ('XXX' = SMS LowCost; 'FR' = SMS Premium; 'WWW' = SMS World) for the Octopush service.
**octopushUserLogin**: The user login (email) for the Octopush service.
**partition**: The partition that contains this resource instance. The resource cannot be moved to another partition.
**resourceOwner**: The name of the person who owns this resource.
